resources.string: We will guide you through these times...
एक देखभाल जो कभी नहीं बुझती
Curb C-19 provides info about 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on facts approved by GoI. Unshackle yourself from unwarranted Forwards or News.
It is our responsibility to ensure that all necessary preventive and protective measures are followed up to minimize Occupational Safety and Health Risks
Early identification and prognosis of the COVID-19 Virus is first and foremost step to prevent the spread of the Coronavirus pandemic in India.
We will handle everything for you. Since you have this app in your pocket, You don\'t have to worry about anything anymore.
